citation: Proclamation under the Copper Mines of Tasmania Pty. Ltd. (Agreement) Act 1999 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Copper Mines of Tasmania Pty. Ltd. (Agreement) Act 1999

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Copper Mines of Tasmania Pty. Ltd. (Agreement) Act 1999 fix 1 September 1999 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

23 August 1999

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

J. A. BACON

Minister for State Development

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 1 September 1999

This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Development.
